text: Blairville is a commune in the Pas-de-Calais department in the Hauts-de-France region in northern France. ==Geography== A farming village located 8 miles (13 km) southwest of Arras on the D34 road. ==Population== ==Sights== * The church of St. Vaast, which, like most of the village, was rebuilt after the ravages of World War I. ==See also== *Communes of the Pas-de-Calais department ==References== * INSEE commune file Category:Communes of Pas-de-Calais
title: Blairville, Pas-de-Calais
